messages.title: Democracy
messages.content: It's NOT WORKING, locally or nationally. Buckinghamshire is a one party state. Last month the Conservatives won 80% of the Bucks council seats with only 53% of the vote. In 2015, all six MPs in Buckinghamshire were Conservative although HALF of voters last month chose NOT to have a Conservative MP.

messages.title: EU Referendum
messages.content: Last June our region voted decisively to REMAIN in the European Union. The referendum left those whose wishes of 48% of voters, and more in our constituency, to have largely been ignored. The challenges have not even trying to build the consensus the UK needs to move forward. This May, tell them NO at the ballot box.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secure affordable homes, investing in young people

leaflet.personalStatement: I am passionate about sustainability, clean and renewable energy, and I am passionate about justice in the UK and the lack of quality, honesty or breadth of ideas in public debate.
